metadata.NAME: MotionSense
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the motion sense. Sensors supported: [Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Battery, LED, DataQuality]

metadata.NAME: Battery
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Current battery level as a percentage from 0%% to 100%%

metadata.NAME: MotionSense
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the motion sense. Sensors supported: [Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Battery, LED, DataQuality]

metadata.NAME: Raw
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Raw byte array

metadata.NAME: MotionSense
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the motion sense. Sensors supported: [Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Battery, LED, DataQuality]

dataDescriptors.NAME: Accelerometer X
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Acceleration minus Gx on the x-axis

dataDescriptors.NAME: Accelerometer Y
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Acceleration minus Gy on the y-axis

dataDescriptors.NAME: Accelerometer Z
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: Acceleration minus Gz on the z-axis

metadata.NAME: Accelerometer
metadata.DESCRIPTION: measures the acceleration applied to the device

metadata.NAME: MotionSense
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the motion sense. Sensors supported: [Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Battery, LED, DataQuality]

metadata.NAME: Gyroscope
metadata.DESCRIPTION: measure the rate of rotation around the device's local X, Y and Z axis

metadata.NAME: MotionSense
metadata.DESCRIPTION: Collects data from the motion sense. Sensors supported: [Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Battery, LED, DataQuality]

dataDescriptors.NAME: Data Quality (Accelerometer)
dataDescriptors.DESCRIPTION: measures the Data Quality of Accelerometer. Values= GOOD(0), BAND_OFF(1), NOT_WORN(2), BAND_LOOSE(3), NOISE(4)

metadata.NAME: Data Quality (Accelerometer)
